title: Intoduction to React
content: React is a Javascript Library that is confused for being a frameword
author: Mary Wanyama

title: Javascript
content: Javascript is a backend and frontend language that make your website interactive
author: Mary Wanyama

title: React Features
content: React has some awesome features such as a components which are written like normal function except the function name is capitalised
author: Mary Wanyama

title: what is the difference between vanilla Js and react
content: The main difference is that React is a declarative language while vanilla Js is an imperative language
author: Mary Wanyama

title: Arrays
content: React uses Js functions to navigate arrays, but arrays in React need a unique key
author: Mary Wanyama

title: CSS and html
content: html make the content of the application while css make the content visually worthy. They are co-dependent
author: Mary Wanyama

title: static and dynamic website
content: In a static website, the users see the same content while in dynamic websites the content changes with the user
author: Mary Wanyama
